comments:
N20031114

Found the followin assertion failure in log when running JDT/Ui tests

!MESSAGE Plug-in descriptor "org.eclipse.update.ui" not found for 
fragment "org.eclipse.update.ui.win32".  Fragment ignored.
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Nov 17, 2003 12:08:41.375
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Initializing Quick Diff".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.AssertionFailedException: assertion failed: 
Lock L/TestSetupProject/src/pack2/C.java was already removed.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.DeadlockDetector.lockWaitStop
(DeadlockDetector.java:294)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.LockManager.removeLockWaitThread
(LockManager.java:169)
	at 
org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs$ThreadJob.reportUnblocked
(ImplicitJobs.java:171)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs$ThreadJob.joinRun
(ImplicitJobs.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.ImplicitJobs.begin
(ImplicitJobs.java:232)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.beginRule
(JobManager.java:115)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.readDocumen
t(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:161)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.editors.quickdiff.LastSaveReferenceProvider.getReferenc
e(LastSaveReferenceProvider.java:63)
	at 
org.eclipse.ui.internal.texteditor.quickdiff.DocumentLineDiffer$1.run
(DocumentLineDiffer.java:520)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

AssertionFailedException inside the Job manager.

Moving to platform core as I think that the problem is on the job manager side.
Please move back otherwise.

The situation is similar to the discussion in bug 44667 (not again...! :-)):

LastSaveReferenceProvider tries to access a file that could get deleted
concurrently. Therefore it uses the IFile as scheduling rule. Should it check
for file.exists() before using it as a rule (it does not currently)?

Max: please investigate

Tom: No, it's nothing to do with whether the file exists.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 46708 ***

traces.message: assertion failed:  Lock L/TestSetupProject/src/pack2/C.java was already removed.
